description:
Representing Individuals Throughout The State

The lawyers at Windom Law Offices have dedicated their legal careers to protecting the rights of personal injury victims and their families in West Virginia. Attorney Rodney Windom has more than 30 years of experience. Attorneys Scott Windom and Paul Morrison each have more than 15 years of experience, including several years spent working in the insurance defense industry. Together, we work to make sure that people who are injured can hold the negligent parties accountable.

As your attorneys, we will seek compensation for your medical bills, lost wages, and pain and suffering. You have the right to file personal injury lawsuits to collect compensation. After a serious injury or wrongful death, it is crucial that you recover enough financial compensation to pay for your past, current and future losses. Without it, you may be unable to pay your bills, especially if you cannot return to work after the accident or you lose a wage-earning member of the family.

We represent injury victims and families who lost loved ones to wrongful death due to:

  • Car and trucking accidents
  • Motorcycle, bicycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Oil, gas and fracking industry accidents
  • Premises liability injuries
  • Dangerous and defective product injuries
  • Medical malpractice

Utilizing our resources and network of experts, we will investigate the accident, determine who is liable and hold that party responsible for your losses.

We understand that this may be a difficult time for you and your family. You can trust us to treat you with compassion throughout your case. We are happy to meet you at your home or in the hospital if you are unable to travel to meet us.

Please call our Harrisville office at 866-451-9642 to schedule an appointment.
